Product Name: #9 x 2-1/2 in. Star Drive Torx Bugle Head R4 Multi-Purpose Wood Screw (300-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
GRKs R4 Multi-Purpose Framing Screw has 6 self-contained cutting pockets which act like a router and transport the drill dust away from the edge of the screw hole. They also widen the countersink hole only around the head shape. The screw head top closes the hole exactly, leaving no damaged fibers around the wider area of the head.
Highlights:
- Faster Drive for Improved Productivity
- Fast Bite Tip provides a fast start for one-step installation
- For interior / exterior use
For use in wood, particle-board, cement fiberboard, plastic, sheet metal Star drive eliminates stripping for improved productivity Zip-Tip allows for no-pre-drilling and 1 step application Self-tapping No pre-drilling No stripped heads Common project applications: remodeling, fencing, storage, cabinets, framing

About This Product
GRK RSS Rugged Structural Screw has a patented design and made of specially hardened steel to provide customers with high tensile, torque and shear strength. The sharp threads and points bite instantly into material, including hardwood, reducing the splitting effect due to smaller shanks. The GRK RSS series screws that are 3-1/8 in. and longer have 6-CEE threads which enlarge the screw hole for the non-threaded portion of the fastener, allowing the wood to settle easily and increases the screw's drawing strength.

Category: Hardware / Fasteners / Screws / Sheet Metal Screws / Self Piercing Screws
Product Name: #10 x 1-1/2 in. Steel External Hex Head Washer Sharp Point Elite Sheet Metal Roofing Screws (100-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Teks Elite 10 x 1-1/2 in. Steel External Hex Head Washer Drill Point Sheet Metal Roofing Screws (100-Pack) provides stronger holding power and improved waterproofing. The Maximum seal (TM) washer provides improved coverage of the screw aiding in better waterproofing, even when fasteners are driven at an angle. The Hi-Grip (TM) threading help secure the fastener with stronger holding power, minimizing the need for rework down the road. The new Shank guard (TM) feature reams out the hole during install, protecting the fastener's shaft and washer from sharp metal frays that could strip the protective Climaseal coating. Finally, the self-tap drill point assists in secure metal-to-metal fastening. Overall, Teks Elite fasteners are designed for the Pro. Less rework. More productivity.
Highlights:
- Secure Flashing for Corrugated Roofing without pre-drilling
- Teks Metal Roofing Screws are Corrosion Resistant
- Tap and fasten metal to metal or metal to wood in one motion
Maximum seal self-sealing EPDM washer provides a waterproof seal in harsh outdoor environments, even when driven at an angle Hi-grip threading helps secure the fastener with stronger holding power, minimizing the need for rework New shank guard feature reams out the hole, protecting fastener's shaft and washer from metal frays that could strip the climaseal coating Fast bite (type 17) tip eliminates pre-drilling and provides a fast start for 1-step installation for secure metal-to-wood fastening Premium finish provides exceptional corrosion resistance in harsh outdoor environments Provides secure fastening with strong holding power Highly versatile Common project applications: corrugated roofing, HVAC, steel stud framing, gutters, flashing for corrugated roofing and register vents

GRK RSS Black Structural Screw is a structural fastener designed for ease of installation and the strongest of connections while providing a bold finish. The Universal Hidden Deck Fastening System is the fastest, easiest way to hide fasteners on grooved decking. The universal hidden clip design works in most leading deck board brands. Category: Hardware / Fasteners / Screws / Sheet Metal Screws / Self Piercing Screws
Product Name: #10 x 1-1/2 in. Steel External Hex Head Washer Sharp Point Elite Sheet Metal Roofing Screws (300-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Teks Elite 10 x 1-1/2 in. Steel External Hex Head Washer Drill Point Sheet Metal Roofing Screws (300-Pack) provides stronger holding power and improved waterproofing. The Maximum seal (TM) washer provides improved coverage of the screw aiding in better waterproofing, even when fasteners are driven at an angle. The Hi-Grip (TM) threading help secure the fastener with stronger holding power, minimizing the need for rework down the road. The new Shank guard (TM) feature reams out the hole during install, protecting the fastener's shaft and washer from sharp metal frays that could strip the protective Climaseal coating. Finally, the self-tap drill point assists in secure metal-to-metal fastening. Overall, Teks Elite fasteners are designed for the Pro. Less rework. More productivity.
Highlights:
- Secure Flashing for Corrugated Roofing without pre-drilling
- Teks Metal Roofing Screws are Corrosion Resistant
- Tap and fasten metal to metal or metal to wood in one motion
Maximum seal self-sealing EPDM washer provides a waterproof seal in harsh outdoor environments, even when driven at an angle Hi-grip threading helps secure the fastener with stronger holding power, minimizing the need for rework New shank guard feature reams out the hole, protecting fastener's shaft and washer from metal frays that could strip the climaseal coating Fast bite (type 17) tip eliminates pre-drilling and provides a fast start for 1-step installation for secure metal-to-wood fastening Premium finish provides exceptional corrosion resistance in harsh outdoor environments Provides secure fastening with strong holding power Highly versatile Common project applications: corrugated roofing, HVAC, steel stud framing, gutters, flashing for corrugated roofing and register vents

Category: Hardware / Fasteners / Screws / Deck Screws / Wood Deck Screws
Product Name: #10 x 3-1/2 in. Red Exterior Self-Starting Star Flat-Head Wood Deck Screws 5 lbs.-Box (280-Piece)
Description:
About This Product
Designed to make the most out of your DIY home projects, DECKMATE exterior wood screws are ideal for use in all treated lumber and all outdoor projects where wood-to-wood connections are necessary. A high-strength polymer coating provides superior corrosion resistance that is guaranteed for the life of your outdoor project. The star drive offers improved torque transfer that avoids stripping and cam-out. There is no need for pre-drilling with DECKMATE screws thanks to the fluted type-17 point, which allows the screw to create its own pilot hole. Each pack sold comes with a T-25 star drive bit to take the guesswork out of installation.
Highlights:
- Designed for use in treated lumber projects
- Polymer coating ensures years of reliable use
- Star drive ensures solid bit connection to eliminate slippage
Specifically designed to drive fast and reduce splitting Nibs under the head allow the screw to countersink for a smoother finish Reinforced neck prevents head from snapping Polymer coating is guaranteed for the life of the project Star drive will not strip or cam-out Type-17 point with flute creates its own pilot hole, eliminating the need for pre-drilling #10 diameter 3-1/2" length

Product Name: #8 x 2 in. Star Drive Bugle Round Head R4 Multipurpose Framing and Decking Screws (850-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
GRKs R4 Multi-Purpose Framing Screw has 6 self-contained cutting pockets which act like a router and transport the drill dust away from the edge of the screw hole. They also widen the countersink hole only around the head shape. The screw head top closes the hole exactly, leaving no damaged fibers around the wider area of the head.
Highlights:
- Faster Drive for Improved Productivity
- Fast Bite Tip provides a fast start for one-step installation
- For interior / exterior use
Recessed star drive allows for zero stripping with 6 points of contact CEE thread enlarges hole to reduce splitting Low torque, smoother drive No pre-drilling allows faster penetration For use in wood, particle-board, cement fiberboard, plastic, sheet metal Star drive eliminates stripping for improved productivity Zip-tip allows for no-pre-drilling and 1 step application Common project applications: remodeling, fencing, storage, cabinets, framing

Description:
About This Product
GRK's R4 self-countersinking screw has a patented under head with saw-blade like cutting teeth and 6 self-contained cutting pockets. Together they act similar to a circular saw-blade, transporting the drill dust away from the edge of the screw hole while cutting a perfectly clean hole into even the most brittle materials without cracking any surface treatment. R4 Multi-Purpose Framing Screws are used for wood, plastic, cement fiber board, particle board, sheet metal, wood decking and melamine. For use in all applications that include pressure treated lumber.

Product Name: #8 x 1-1/2 in. Star Drive Bugle Head R4 Multi-Purpose Wood Screw (6,500-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
GRK's R4 self-countersinking screw has a patented under head with saw-blade like cutting teeth and 6 self-contained cutting pockets. Together they act similar to a circular saw-blade, transporting the drill dust away from the edge of the screw hole while cutting a perfectly clean hole into even the most brittle materials without cracking any surface treatment. R4 Multi-Purpose Framing Screws are used for wood, plastic, cement fiber board, particle board, sheet metal, wood decking and melamine. For use in all applications that include pressure treated lumber.
Highlights:
- Faster Drive for Improved Productivity
- W-Cut provides low torque for fast driving and ease of install
- For interior / exterior use
Recessed star drive allows for zero stripping with 6 points of contact CEE thread enlarges hole to reduce splitting Low torque, smoother drive No pre-drilling allows faster penetration

Product Name: #9 x 2 in. Star Drive Bugle Head R4 Multi-Purpose Wood Screw (3,700-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
GRK's R4 self-countersinking screw has a patented under head with saw-blade like cutting teeth and 6 self-contained cutting pockets. Together they act similar to a circular saw-blade, transporting the drill dust away from the edge of the screw hole while cutting a perfectly clean hole into even the most brittle materials without cracking any surface treatment. R4 Multi-Purpose Framing Screws are used for wood, plastic, cement fiber board, particle board, sheet metal, wood decking and melamine. For use in all applications that include pressure treated lumber.
Highlights:
- Faster Drive for Improved Productivity
- Fast Bite Tip provides a fast start for one-step installation
- For interior / exterior use
Recessed star drive allows for zero stripping with 6 points of contact CEE thread enlarges hole to reduce splitting Low torque, smoother drive No pre-drilling allows faster penetration

Product Name: 5/16 in. x 5 -1/8 in. Star Drive Low Profile Washer Head RSS Structural Screws (300-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
GRK RSS Rugged Structural Screw has a patented design and made of especially hardened steel to provide customers with high tensile, torque and shear strength. The sharp threads and points bite instantly into material, including hardwood, reducing the splitting effect due to smaller shanks. The GRK RSS series screws that are 3-1/8 in. and longer have 6 CEE threads which enlarge the screw hole for the non-threaded portion of the fastener, allowing the wood to settle easily and increases the screw's drawing strength.
Highlights:
- Easy to install lag screw alternative
- Integrated washer head allows for maximum clamping force
- Stainless Steel for superior Corrosion Resistance
Uses GRK bit T-30 Patented climatek coating for all weather corrosion protection Self-tapping W-cut thread design with zip tip Includes: 300 screws May be used as a lag screw alternative

Product Name: 5/16 in. x 5-1/8 in. Star Drive Low Profile Washer Head RSS Black Rugged Structural Wood Screw (25-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
GRK RSS Black Structural Screw is a structural fastener designed for ease of installation and the strongest of connections while providing a bold finish. With proprietary features like the Zip-Tip and W-Cut thread, RSS fasteners drive into most woods without the need for pre-drilling. The specially engineered design results in a low-effort installation, especially compared to conventional lag screws. RSS Rugged Structural Screws have a Climatek Coating for installation in both interior and exterior conditions where exposure to moisture is intermittent and is code-approved for use in treated lumber.

The GRK RSS series screws that are 3-1/8 in. and longer have 6-CEE threads which enlarge the screw hole for the non-threaded portion of the fastener, allowing the wood to settle easily and increases the screw's drawing strength.
Highlights:
- Easy to install lag screw alternative
- Integrated washer head allows for maximum clamping force
- Stainless Steel for superior Corrosion Resistance

Product Name: #9 x 2-1/2 in. 1/4-Hex Drive, Strong-Drive SD Connector Screw (100-Pack)
Description: About This Product The Strong-Drive SD Connector screw is specifically designed to replace nails in certain Simpson Strong-Tie connectors and is the only screw approved for that application. The load-rated SD screw has been tested and approved for use in many popular Simpson Strong-Tie products. In certain applications screws are easier and more convenient to install than nails, and the single-fastener load values achieved by the SD screw exceed those of typical 10d common or 16d common nails. In addition, the galvanized coating makes the SD screw ideal for interior and most exterior conditions. Highlights: - Global leader in structural construction products since 1956 - Products designed and tested for strength and easy installation - Diverse product line trusted by Pros and DIYers alike Tested and approved for use in many of Simpson Strong-Tie's best-selling connectors for both interior and most exterior applications Ideal for use in connector applications where more control is desired or using a hammer is inconvenient 1/4-in hex head with 0.37-in diameter integrated washer reduces cam-out and is stamped with the Simpson Strong-Tie "≠" sign and the fastener size for easy identification after installation Shank is specifically designed to match the fastener holes in Simpson Strong-Tie connectors Optimized heat treating for ductility and strength Size: #9 x 2-1/2 in. Hex driver included Mechanically galvanized, Class 55 coating meets the requirements for use in preservative-treated and fire-retardant-treated wood per the 2012 and 215 IRC Quantity: 100 Common project applications: remodeling, fencing, storage, cabinets, framing Shop all Simpson Strong-Tie here. Product Name: K-Body REVO JR 36 in. Capacity Parallel Clamp with 3-1/4 in. Throat Depth
Description:
About This Product
The BESSEY K Body REVO is a new, mid-sized version of what made the full-sized REVO parallel clamp so great. While 30-40% lighter than other parallel clamps of similar capacity, still offers 900 lbs. of clamping force. This degree of performance is still better than that of many of our competitors' full sized products.
Highlights:
- Parallel jaws are designed to clamp at a nominal 90° angle
- Mid-sized parallel clamp, rated at 900 lbs. of clamping force
- Ideal for cabinetry or case work
Large parallel clamping surface with removable jaw protective pads Large and easy to turn wood handle Jaws clamp at accurate 90° angles K BODY REVO JR may be light in weight but not light on clamping force, it provides up to 900 lbs. of clamping force Easily converts to spreader, no tools required

Product Name: 1/4 in. x 1-1/4 in. Hex Zinc Plated Lag Screw (100-Pack)
Description: About This Product Lag Screws are hex head screws with thick shafts and coarse threads. They are designed to securely join wood pieces together in heavy load applications. Commonly used for decks, framing, retaining walls, and wooden playground equipment. Lag Screws can also be used in masonry if combined with a lag shield. Highlights: - Lag screws, also called lag bolts, firmly fasten wood together - Stronger and thicker than typical wood screws - Ideal for woodworking involving heavy pieces joined together Extremely sturdy load-bearing fastener Made from zinc plated steel for durability Lag screws can withstand significant stress over a long period of time A 5/32 in. pilot hole is recommended Use with a 7/16 in. drive Includes 100 lag screws to complete your building project Knowing the correct types of fasteners will make your projects run more smoothly and be more secure. Product Name: 1/2 in.-13 x 2-1/2 in. Galvanized Carriage Bolt (25-Pack)
Description: About This Product Carriage bolts have a smooth rounded head with a square neck underneath that locks into wood when tightened. Use with a pre-drilled hole and secure with a hex nut and washer to prevent spinning. They are great fasteners for decks, play equipment, docks, fencing, and furniture. Highlights: - Extremely sturdy load-bearing fastener - Square neck prevents the bolt from turning once installed - Smooth round head is safe for furniture and play equipment The unique design is great for connections where the head is not accessible for tightening Made from galvanized steel for great corrosion resistance The self-locking square neck and coarse threads fasten very securely Fully threaded Includes 25 pieces to complete your project Knowing the correct types of fasteners will make your projects run more smoothly and be more secure. About This Product

Description:
About This Product
These pro-grade carriage bolts come with Rust Defender nano-ceramic finish for a step up from galvanized bolts. They have a smooth rounded head with a square neck underneath that locks into wood when tightened. Use with a pre-drilled hole and secure with a hex nut and washer to prevent spinning. Product Name: ALFA-LOK 3 in. x 1 in. Strips in Black (2-Sets per Pack)
Description: About This Product The VELCRO Brand ALFA-LOK Fasteners feature a strong, self-engaging tape for securing items indoors or out. It features a hook-to-hook engagement system for a heavy duty hold. Ideal for extreme conditions, the Snap-Lock Technology allows the fasteners to be mounted horizontally or vertically for a secure and strong hold. The ALFA-LOK Fasteners are self-engaging and multidirectional so it can be used in any position by pressing the two parts together firmly. Designed for use in a wide range of outdoor applications, it can be used as a concrete fastener or metal fastener for affixing solar panels or security cameras. Also perfect for hanging indoor signage at trade show exhibitions or securing a toll transponder to a car's windshield, the uses are endless. These fasteners are designed for semi-permanent mounting and maintain high strength and long term attachment when they are infrequently opened and closed. VELCRO's Brand ALFA-LOK Fasteners provide a secure and reliable hold for use at home, office, car, garage, or anywhere a strong hold is required. Highlights: - Super strong holding power with audible click - Adheres to surfaces like metal, wood, glass, vinyl and concrete - High strength, long term attachment NO LOOP (SOFT) SIDE: Snap-Lock technology Snaps together for incredibly strong hold SECURE HOLD: Mounts flush and wobble-free, it's perfect for mounting cameras, light sensors, and solar panels; trade show signage and exhibition stand displays; or securing a toll transponder to a car's windshield...the uses are endless SUITABLE FOR EXTREME WEATHER CONDITIONS: Ideal for use indoors or outdoors, these fasteners have strong staying power even in extreme weather conditions; water and UV resistance keeps them firmly in place during rain, snow, or sweltering heat NO TOOLS REQUIRED: Featuring easy-to-use snap-lock technology, the strong, self-engaging tape snaps in place when firmly pressed together; an audible click alerts when it's securely joined MULTI-USE APPLICATIONS: Ideal for a broad range of surfaces and applications; adheres to smooth or textured (mildly rough) surfaces, including metal, wood, glass, vinyl and concrete; not recommended for use on drywall Designed for extreme temperatures from minus 40°F to 194°F Product Information Internet # 308670043 Model # VEL-30642-USA Store SKU # 1004417309 Store SO SKU # None

Product Name: 3 in. x 120 in. 30-Degree Brite Smooth Paper-Taped Framing Nails with Compact Framing Nailer
Description: About This Product Paslode 30 Degree Brite Framing Nails are designed and manufactured to match the specs of Paslode framing nailers so your nailer will run smoothly, with fewer jams and misfires. Paslode nails drive flush even into the harder woods and LVL's. Use Paslode Brite Framing nails for interior framing jobs (Paslode Pallet deal includes 48 boxes of nails and Free Framing Nailer). Complete tough tasks with this Pneumatic 3-1/4 in. 30 Degree Compact Framing Nailer. The smart design cuts down on jams and misfires. It features an ergonomic design, so it fits comfortably in your hand. It also allows you to use this tool in tight spaces. When used with Paslode framing nails, this nailing system's heavy-duty power can help you frame walls faster to bring jobs in on time, every time. Highlights: - Paslode Paper-Tape Framing Nails for Framing, Decking and Fencing - Pallet of 48 boxes of Paslode 3 in. x 0.120 Brite framing nails - Free Paslode compact framing nailer Use with Paslode 30 Degree framing nails for interior framing applications Code compliant: IMCT ES-3072 - no project delays from failed inspections Paslode reinforced round head design for better drive performance in the hardest materials Paslode 30-degree paper tape framing nails are available in 2-3/8 in. to 3-1/4 in. lengths; 0.113 in. to 0.131 in. shank diameters 10% more nails per strip means more time working, less time reloading Full round head provides round head performance in a 30 Degree collation For Wall Studs, Truss Attachments, Wall panels, Rim and Floor Joists, Roofing, Decking, Blocking and Fencing Special tip coating for more holding power (3 in. and longer) Paslode Paper tape collation resists breaking when dropped and deterioration in wet weather, no job site debris to clean up Paslode Brite framing nails have a reinforced round head designed to drive nails in the hardest materials Experience consistent nailing, purchase 48-boxes of Paslode Brite framing nails and receive a Paslode Compact 30-Degree framing nailer Offer only applies to Paslode pallet deal, limit one per customer Check Out Paslode's full line of framing nails Check out our helpful buying guide to learn more about nailers. Product Name: 5/16 in.-18 x 4 in. Galvanized Hex Bolt
Description: About This Product Hex bolts are hexagonal head fasteners with machine threads. They are commonly used for machinery and construction projects, both residential and commercial. Fully threaded sizes provide excellent grip strength. Partially threaded sizes help where shear resistance is important. Secure with a corresponding nut or use in a tapped (threaded) hole. Highlights: - Easy to install with a wrench - Great strength to weight ratio - Quick disassembly for repairs and maintenance Used to connect both metal and wood components Made from galvanized steel for great corrosion resistance Use with a 1/2 in. drive Fully threaded Includes 1 hex bolt to complete your project Knowing the correct types of fasteners will make your projects run more smoothly and be more secure. This guide will tell you about the types of nuts and bolts and the different types of bolt heads. Purchasing the right grade of bolt will make sure you have a solid, durable joining of two materials. Choosing the right type of washer for a project can be more complicated than it seems. This guide will list and describe the many types of washers and their recommended purposes. Product Name: 3 in. x 0.131-Gauge 21-Degree Brite Smooth Shank Plastic Collated Framing Nails (2000 per Box)
Description:
About This Product
Paslode 3 in. x 0.131-Gauge 21° Brite Smooth Shank Plastic Collated Framing Nails provide less breakage, fewer jams and misfires and no stinging. A durable resin collation allows the nails the flexibility to not break when dropped. Paslode 21° nails have a shear-point collation that helps reduce jams and misfires. Finally, there is no stinging or flying debris hitting you in the face while you work.
Highlights:
- Paslode 21° nails do not break when dropped
- More productivity with fewer jams and misfires
- No stinging or flying debris in your face or on the jobsite
Use with Paslode 21° framing nailers for exterior sheathing and framing applications Available in 2-3/8 in. to 3-1/4 in. nail lengths, 0.113 Dia, 0.120 Dia and 0.131 Dia 35 nails per strip for improved productivity and less re-loading Less breakage: nails do not break when dropped No stinging or flying debris in your face or on your jobsite Durable resin collation reduces strip waste, saves time and money Collation shears cleanly behind each nail for less downtime Full head design meets building codes Compatible with all 21° framing nailers

Description:
About This Product
Grip-Rite 2GCS1 #8 x 2 in. Star Drive Dual Flat Head Coarse Thread Construction Screws feature a T17 point which means you won't need to pre-drill during construction. Designed for interior, wood to wood applications, the coarse auger threads reduce splitting and speed installation. The T-25 star drive reduces slippage and handles more torque than other designs. Yellow zinc coating combats corrosion and adds an attractive color to wooden construction applications.
Highlights:
- #8 x 2 in. general construction screws
- Hand drive fastener for non structural wood to wood applications
- Made from high strength steel for robust durability

Product Name: 3/8 in.-16 x 2 in. Rust Defender Hex Bolt
Description:
About This Product
Hex bolts are hexagonal head fasteners with machine threads. They are commonly used for machinery and construction projects, both residential and commercial. Fully threaded sizes provide excellent grip strength. Partially threaded sizes help where shear resistance is important. Secure with a corresponding nut or use in a tapped (threaded) hole.
Highlights:
- Easy to install with a wrench
- Great strength to weight ratio
- Quick disassembly for repairs and maintenance
Used to connect both metal and wood components Made from steel with Rust Defender nano-ceramic finish for 2 times the corrosion resistance of galvanized hex bolts Use with a 9/16 in. drive 1 in. thread length Includes 1 hex bolt to complete your project Fully threaded 1-piece

Product Name: 1/4 in.-20 x 3 in. Zinc Plated Hex Bolt (100-Pack)
Description: About This Product Hex bolts are hexagonal head fasteners with machine threads. They are commonly used for machinery and construction projects, both residential and commercial. Highlights: - Lag screws, also called lag bolts, firmly fasten wood together - Stronger and thicker than typical wood screws - Ideal for woodworking involving heavy pieces joined together Extremely sturdy load-bearing fastener Made from galvanized steel for great corrosion resistance Lag screws can withstand significant stress over a long period of time A 3/16 in. pilot hole is recommended Use with a 1/2 in. drive Includes 25 lag screws to complete your building project Knowing the correct types of fasteners will make your projects run more smoothly and be more secure. Description:
About This Product
Fully specced for structural applications. Star and Hex Drive reduces Cam-out and for easy slip-free driving. Unique serrated thread for secure fastening. Most of our line offers a Type 17-point which eliminates the need for pre-drilling and reduces wood splitting. (Timber Screws, Hex Head Construction and Ledger Screws are not equipped with Type 17-point). Exterior screws are encased with our premium XL 1500 coating to resist the environment, wood acids and treatment. Top quality alloy steel and are case hardened. - For interior / exterior use

These hex lag screws are hexagonal drive screws used for directly fastening into wood. Common applications include retaining walls, deck frames, and outdoor play equipment. When used in conjunction with a lag shield, lag screws can also be used in masonry applications. Use in pre-drilled hole. The length of a lag screw is measured from the underside of the head to the pointed tip of the screw. Available in various materials and finishes to suit your specific application.

The standard bolt is compatible with standard nuts and washers of the same thread pitch, grade, and finish. Grade 8 bolts have a higher strength and are to be used with Grade 8 nuts. Available in various materials, grades, and finishes. Description:
About This Product
These hex lag screws are hexagonal drive screws used for directly fastening into wood. Common applications include retaining walls, deck frames, and outdoor play equipment. When used in conjunction with a lag shield, lag screws can also be used in masonry applications. Use in pre-drilled hole. The length of a lag screw is measured from the underside of the head to the pointed tip of the screw. Available in various materials and finishes to suit your specific application.

Product Name: 1/2 in. x 8 in. External Hex Hex-Head Lag Screws (10-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
These hex lag screws are hexagonal drive screws used for directly fastening into wood. Common applications include retaining walls, deck frames, and outdoor play equipment. When used in conjunction with a lag shield, lag screws can also be used in masonry applications. Use in pre-drilled hole. The length of a lag screw is measured from the underside of the head to the pointed tip of the screw. Available in various materials and finishes to suit your specific application.
Highlights:
- Hexagonal drive for secure and direct wood fastening
- Made of high-grade steel to ensure durability
- Versatile use in wood, masonry, and outdoor projects

Product Name: 6M-1 x 45 mm Grade 8.8 Zinc-Plated Hex-Head Metric Cap Screw
Description:
About This Product
Crown Bolt's metric hex bolts, also known as cap screws, have hexagonal heads and are for general purpose applications with a socket type installation tool or standard wrench. The standard bolt is compatible with standard nuts and washers of the same thread pitch, grade, and finish. Grade 8 bolts have a higher strength and are to be used with Grade 8 nuts. An alternative for using hex bolts without nuts is to place them directly into a compatible female threaded receptacle. They require a pre drilled hole or pre-taped hole with compatible female thread. Available in various materials, grades, and finishes.
Highlights:

1-piece per bag Steel construction Zinc-plated 6 m-1 x 45 m

Product Name: 5/16 in. x 3 in. Galvanized Hex Bolt (15-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
These hex bolts have hexagonal heads and are for general purpose applications with a socket type installation tool or standard wrench. The standard bolt is compatible with standard nuts and washers of the same thread pitch, grade, and finish. Grade-8 bolts have a higher strength and are to be used with Grade-8 nuts. An alternative for using hex bolts without nuts is to place them directly into a compatible female threaded receptacle. They require a pre drilled hole or pre-tapped hole with compatible female thread. Available in various materials, grades, and finishes.
Highlights:
- Steel construction with galvanized finish for durability
- Hexagonal head design allows easy installation and use
- Grade-8 bolts offer higher strength

Product Name: 2 in. x 113 in. 30-Degree Heavy-Duty Galvanized Ring Shank Paper-Taped Framing Nails with Compact Framing Nailer
Description: About This Product Paslode Hot Dipped Galvanized 30 Degree Framing Nails are designed and manufactured to match the specifications of Paslode framing nailers so your nailer will run smoothly, with fewer jams and misfires. Paslode nails drive flush even into the harder woods and LVL's. Paslode adds a polymer coating around the shanks and heads to reduce staining, streaking and nail discoloration. Use Paslode Hot Dipped Galvanized framing nails for exterior framing jobs (Paslode Pallet deal includes 48 boxes of nails and Free Framing Nailer). Complete tough tasks with this Pneumatic 3-1/4 in. 30 Degree Compact Framing Nailer. The smart design cuts down on jams and misfires. It features an ergonomic design, so it fits comfortably in your hand. It also allows you to use this tool in tight spaces. Highlights: - Paslode Paper-Tape Framing Nails for Framing, Decking and Fencing - Pallet of 48 boxes of Paslode 2 in. x 0.113 HDG framing nails - Free Paslode compact framing nailer Use with Paslode 30 Degree framing nails for exterior framing applications Code compliant: ASTM A 153, IRC R 319.3, ICC ES-3072 - no project delays from failed inspections High corrosion resistance in LVL, including ACQ and MCQ Paslode 30-degree paper tape framing nails are available in 2 in. to 3-1/2 in. L: 0.113 in. to 0.131 in. shank diameters 10% more nails per strip means more time working, less time reloading Full round head provides round head performance in a 30 Degree collation Patented fluted shank design and our red tip coating allow for easy drive and secure holding strength Paslode special polymer coating reduces staining and streaking by 80% compared to other hot dipped galvanized nails Paslode Paper tape collation resists breaking when dropped and deterioration in wet weather, no job site debris to clean up Paslode hot-dipped galvanized framing nails have a special polymer coating that reduces staining and streaking by 80% Experience consistent nailing, purchase 48-boxes of Paslode Hot-Dipped Galvanized framing nails and receive a Paslode Compact 30-Degree framing nailer Offer only applies to Paslode pallet deal, limit one per customer Check Out Paslode's full line of framing nails Check out our helpful buying guide to learn more about nailers. Product Name: 5/16 in. x 1-1/2 in. Galvanized Hex Bolt (15-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
These hex bolts have hexagonal heads and are for general purpose applications with a socket type installation tool or standard wrench. The standard bolt is compatible with standard nuts and washers of the same thread pitch, grade, and finish. Grade-8 bolts have a higher strength and are to be used with Grade-8 nuts. An alternative for using hex bolts without nuts is to place them directly into a compatible female threaded receptacle. They require a pre drilled hole or pre-tapped hole with compatible female thread. Available in various materials, grades, and finishes.
Highlights:
- Steel construction with galvanized finish for durability
- Hexagonal head design allows easy installation and use
- Grade-8 bolts offer higher strength

Product Name: 1/4 in. x 5-5/8 in. Hex-Head Self-Tapping OWT Timber Screws (25-per Box)
Description:
About This Product
OWT lag bolts have aggressive threads and a sharp point that penetrate wood without pre-drilling. OWT lag bolts are especially designed for use with OWT wood ties but they are also perfect for replacing galvanized spikes in raised flower beds, landscaping or retaining walls. No need to pre-drill and sledge a spike. OWT lag bolts are protected with a specially designed coating that provides corrosion resistance for the life of the project. ACQ approved.
Highlights:
- Ideal for OWT wood ties or as a replacement for galvanized spikes
- Sharp point eliminates the need for predrilling of wood surfaces
- Coated to prevent corrosion, rust, and streaks for lasting use
No pre-drilling Built in washer Guaranteed not to rust or streak ACQ approved Common project applications: remodeling, fencing, storage, cabinets, framing

Product Name: 3/8 in. x 3-1/2 in. A307 Grade A Zinc Plated Steel Hex Lag Screws (50-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Lag screw bolts are used in place of standard wood screws whenever the mounting surface must bear a heavy load. The hex head allows for lag screws to be tightened with more torque than can be used on Phillips head screws, though a pilot hole is still required prior to installation. Note that lag screws do not accept nuts as they are technically thick heavy duty wood screws with threads designed to cut into wood. They are ideal for use on decks since installation can be accomplished without having access to both ends of the fastener, as opposed to standard hex bolts that require a nut on the opposite end.
Highlights:
- Used on wood posts or studs
- Use a size smaller drill bit for pilot holes
- Steel construction offers long-lasting use and solid performance
Size: 3/8 inch X 3-1/2 inch Heavy duty wood screw with 6 sided hex bolt head Features deep wood screw threads and does not accept a nut Used in applications where standard wood screws cannot support the load (deck building, etc.) Requires pilot hole to be drilled and installs using wrench or socket tool Thread Type: Deep, Point Style: Gimlet Specification(s) Met: ASME B18.2.1 and ASTM A307A

Product Name: Stainless Steel Carriage Bolt (5/16"-18 Coarse Thread x 3/4" Length)
Description:
About This Product
Carriage bolts are designed to fasten a wooden face to either a wood or metal frame. Its flat head is designed to eliminate the need for a washer and provide a semi-flush finish to applications. The square underside of the head is self-locking to eliminate spinning and the need for a driving tool. Stainless steel finish provides superior rust prevention, terrific for all outdoor applications.
Highlights:
- Ideal for fastening a wooden face to a metal or a wooden frame
- Stainless steel construction for enhanced corrosion resistance
- Self-locking underside eliminates the need for a driving tool
Carriage bolts have a domed head that is not designed to be driven A bolt with a square shoulder under a rounded head which resists turning when the nut is tightened Stainless steels are used for their corrosion resistance, high-temperature strength, scaling resistance, and low-temperature toughness Flat-styled head allows for a smooth exterior finish Full box contains 10 pieces Item sold individually at retail

Product Name: 1/4 in. x 1-1/4 in. External Hex Hex-Head Cap Screw (10-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex cap screws are bolts with hexagonal heads and machine threads for use with a nut or in a tapped hole. These screws are bolts with a washer face under the head. Use these coarse partially threaded screws anywhere a hex bolt may be used. Tighten with a wrench or a drill. Hex cap screws can be used when looking for outdoor applications or a stronger bolt. The name "hex cap screw" and "hex bolt" are commonly interchanged.
Highlights:
- For use in construction, agricultural, and automotive projects
- Stainless steel provides a polished look and corrosion protection
- Hex cap head and machine threads combine to handle higher torque
An alternative for using them without nuts is to install them directly into a compatible internally threaded hole A hex cap screw is actually manufactured with tighter tolerances and can be used anywhere a hex bolt is used Thread type: coarse Stainless steel

Product Name: 1/4 in.-20 x 3-1/2 in. Grade 304 Stainless Steel Hex Bolts (25-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex bolts are one of the most common fasteners and can be used in a wide variety of applications. The 6 sided head makes them easy to install using a standard wrench or socket tool. Nuts and washers are not included, so will need to be purchased separately. Washers help to evenly distribute the load and should always be used under the bolt head and under the nut (just under the bolt head if installing into a threaded hole). Flat washers and finished/standard hex nuts work great for most applications, though if the bolt may be subject to excessive vibration, it is recommended that lock washers and lock nuts be used instead.
Highlights:
- Installs easily with most wrenches
- Designed to be used with the same sized nut
- Steel construction offers long-lasting use and solid performance
Size: 1/4 inch-20 X 3-1/2 inch One of the most common and versatile fasteners Designed for use with a nut or a threaded hole of the same diameter and thread size Features a 6 sided head and can be fastened using a wrench or socket tool Nuts and washers not included Thread Type: Coarse, Thread Class: UNC-2A, Point Style: Blunt Specification(s) Met: ASME B18.2.1and ASTM F593

Product Name: 3/8 in.-16 x 6 in. Grade 304 Stainless Steel Hex Bolts (15-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex bolts are one of the most common fasteners and can be used in a wide variety of applications. The 6 sided head makes them easy to install using a standard wrench or socket tool. Nuts and washers are not included, so will need to be purchased separately. Washers help to evenly distribute the load and should always be used under the bolt head and under the nut (just under the bolt head if installing into a threaded hole). Flat washers and finished/standard hex nuts work great for most applications, though if the bolt may be subject to excessive vibration, it is recommended that lock washers and lock nuts be used instead.
Highlights:
- Installs easily with most wrenches
- Designed to be used with the same sized nut
- Stainless steel construction offers rust-resistant performance
Size: 3/8 inch-16 X 6 inch One of the most common and versatile fasteners Designed for use with a nut or a threaded hole of the same diameter and thread size Features a 6 sided head and can be fastened using a wrench or socket tool Nuts and washers not included Thread type: coarse, thread class: UNC-2A, point style: blunt Specification(s) met: ASME B18.2.1 and ASTM F593

Product Name: 1/4 in. x 1 in. External Hex Hex-Head Lag Screws (10-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Lag Screws are used to fasten wood-to-wood and metal-to-wood, attach objects to wood, and affix items to concrete and masonry when combined with lag expansion shields. They are heavy-duty wood screws that are available in larger sizes both in terms of diameter and length and usually have a hex head to facilitate higher installation torque using a wrench. While lateral strength is lower than a comparable bolt and nut, lag screws are useful when access to one side of the joint is limited, the appearance of a nut is undesirable or through-bolt length is excessive.
Highlights:

Hex head is easily driven with simple wrenches and requires minimal clearance above the fastener Common applications include retaining walls, deck frames, and outdoor play equipment Stainless-steel material Use in pre-drilled hole

Product Name: 1/2 in. x 1-1/2 in. External Hex Hex-Head Cap Screw (4-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex cap screws are bolts with hexagonal heads and machine threads for use with a nut or in a tapped hole. These screws are bolts with a washer face under the head. Use these coarse partially threaded screws anywhere a hex bolt may be used. Tighten with a wrench or a drill. Hex cap screws can be used when looking for outdoor applications or a stronger bolt. The name "hex cap screw" and "hex bolt" are commonly interchanged.
Highlights:

An alternative for using them without nuts is to install them directly into a compatible internally threaded hole A hex cap screw is actually manufactured with tighter tolerances and can be used anywhere a hex bolt is used Thread type: fine Stainless steel

Product Name: 3/8 in. x 3 in. Black Exterior Hex Head Lag Screw
Description:
About This Product
These hexagonal lag screws are ideal for directly fastening into wood. When used in conjunction with a lag shield, lag screws can be used in masonry applications as well as in retaining walls, deck frames and outdoor play equipment. Made of durable steel, use these durable black screws in pre-drilled holes.
Highlights:
- Perfect for interior, exterior, and decorative applications.
- Black ceramic coating provides lifetime corrosion resistance.
- Use with flat washers or fender washers.

About This Product
Hex bolts are machine bolts that have been designed to adhere facing materials to prevent shear movement, specifically in wood to wood, wood to metal, or metal to metal applications. 18-8 stainless bolts are recommended for most general uses and offer best-in-class corrosion resistance. - Includes 10 hex-head bolts to ensure versatile use

About This Product
Hex bolts are machine bolts that have been designed to adhere facing materials to prevent shear movement, specifically in wood to wood, wood to metal, or metal to metal applications. 18-8 stainless bolts are recommended for most general uses and offer best-in-class corrosion resistance. Be sure to pre-drill any holes and to use washers and nuts that are a similar grade and finish.
Highlights:
- Helps fasten facing pieces of metal or wood to each other
- Corrosion-resistant stainless steel construction for durability
- Includes 6 hex-head bolts to ensure versatile use

Product Name: 1/2 in.-13 x 2-1/2 in. Grade 304 Stainless Steel Hex Bolts (25-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex bolts are one of the most common fasteners and can be used in a wide variety of applications. The 6 sided head makes them easy to install using a standard wrench or socket tool. Nuts and washers are not included, so will need to be purchased separately. Washers help to evenly distribute the load and should always be used under the bolt head and under the nut (just under the bolt head if installing into a threaded hole). Flat washers and finished/standard hex nuts work great for most applications, though if the bolt may be subject to excessive vibration, it is recommended that lock washers and lock nuts be used instead.
Highlights:
- Installs easily with most wrenches
- Designed to be used with the same sized nut
- Stainless steel construction offers rust-resistant performance
Size: 1/2 inch-13 X 2-1/2 inch One of the most common and versatile fasteners Designed for use with a nut or a threaded hole of the same diameter and thread size Features a 6 sided head and can be fastened using a wrench or socket tool Nuts and washers not included Thread type: coarse, thread class: UNC-2A, point style: blunt Specification(s) met: ASME B18.2.1 and ASTM F593

Product Name: 1/4 in. x 5 in. External Hex Full Thread Hex-Head Bolts (6-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex bolts are machine bolts that have been designed to adhere facing materials to prevent shear movement, specifically in wood to wood, wood to metal, or metal to metal applications. 18-8 stainless bolts are recommended for most general uses and offer best-in-class corrosion resistance. Be sure to pre-drill any holes and to use washers and nuts that are a similar grade and finish.
Highlights:
- Fasten facing pieces of wood and/or metal to each other
- Fully threaded shank offers added security and peace-of-mind
- Made using Grade 2 steel
An alternative for using them without nuts is to install them directly into a compatible internally threaded hole A hex cap screw is actually manufactured with tighter tolerances and can be used anywhere a hex bolt is used Fully threaded Stainless-steel material

Product Name: 3/8 in x 4 in.External Hex Hex-Head Lag Screws (3-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Lag Screws are used to fasten wood-to-wood and metal-to-wood, attach objects to wood, and affix items to concrete and masonry when combined with lag expansion shields. They are heavy-duty wood screws that are available in larger sizes both in terms of diameter and length and usually have a hex head to facilitate higher installation torque using a wrench. While lateral strength is lower than a comparable bolt and nut, lag screws are useful when access to one side of the joint is limited, the appearance of a nut is undesirable or through-bolt length is excessive.
Highlights:
- Made of sturdy stainless steel; for use in pre-drilled holes
- Hex head enables higher installation torque using a simple wrench
- 3-pack 3/8 in. x 3 in. external hex-head lag screws
Hex head is easily driven with simple wrenches and requires minimal clearance above the fastener Common applications include retaining walls, deck frames, and outdoor play equipment Stainless steel material Use in pre-drilled hole

Product Name: 7/16 in. x 2-1/2 in. External Hex Hex-Head Cap Screw (4-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex cap screws are bolts with hexagonal heads and machine threads for use with a nut or in a tapped hole. These screws are bolts with a washer face under the head. Use these coarse partially threaded screws anywhere a hex bolt may be used. Tighten with a wrench or a drill. Hex cap screws can be used when looking for outdoor applications or a stronger bolt. The name "hex cap screw" and "hex bolt" are commonly interchanged.
Highlights:
- Made from stainless steel for enhanced corrosion resistance
- USS coarse threads offer high torque capability
- Pack of 4 hex-head cap screws ensures versatile use

Product Name: 1/4 in.-20 x 2 in. Grade 304 Stainless Steel Hex Bolts (50-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex bolts are one of the most common fasteners and can be used in a wide variety of applications. The 6 sided head makes them easy to install using a standard wrench or socket tool. Nuts and washers are not included, so will need to be purchased separately. Washers help to evenly distribute the load and should always be used under the bolt head and under the nut (just under the bolt head if installing into a threaded hole). Flat washers and finished/standard hex nuts work great for most applications, though if the bolt may be subject to excessive vibration, it is recommended that lock washers and lock nuts be used instead.
Highlights:
- Installs easily with most wrenches
- Designed to be used with the same sized nut
- Stainless steel construction offers rust-resistant performance

Product Name: 3/8 in. x 3 in. External Hex Hex-Head Lag Screws (3-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Lag Screws are used to fasten wood-to-wood and metal-to-wood, attach objects to wood, and affix items to concrete and masonry when combined with lag expansion shields. They are heavy-duty wood screws that are available in larger sizes both in terms of diameter and length and usually have a hex head to facilitate higher installation torque using a wrench. While lateral strength is lower than a comparable bolt and nut, lag screws are useful when access to one side of the joint is limited, the appearance of a nut is undesirable or through-bolt length is excessive.
Highlights:
- Made of sturdy stainless steel; for use in pre-drilled holes
- Hex head enables higher installation torque using a simple wrench
- 3-pack 3/8 in. x 3 in. external hex-head lag screws
Hex head is easily driven with simple wrenches and requires minimal clearance above the fastener Common applications include retaining walls, deck frames, and outdoor play equipment Stainless steel material Use in pre-drilled hole

Product Name: 1/2 in. x 2-1/2 in. External Hex Hex-Head Cap Screw (3-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
Hex cap screws are bolts with hexagonal heads and machine threads for use with a nut or in a tapped hole. These screws are bolts with a washer face under the head. Use these coarse partially threaded screws anywhere a hex bolt may be used. Tighten with a wrench or a drill. Hex cap screws can be used when looking for outdoor applications or a stronger bolt. The name "hex cap screw" and "hex bolt" are commonly interchanged.
Highlights:
- Made from stainless steel for enhanced corrosion resistance
- SAE fine threads offer high torque capability
- Pack of 3 hex-head cap screws ensures versatile use
An alternative for using them without nuts is to install them directly into a compatible internally threaded hole A hex cap screw is actually manufactured with tighter tolerances and can be used anywhere a hex bolt is used Thread type SAE Stainless steel

Use with a pre-drilled hole and secure with a hex nut and washer to prevent spinning. They are great fasteners for decks, play equipment, docks, fencing, and furniture. Highlights: - Extremely sturdy load-bearing fastener - Square neck prevents the bolt from turning once installed - Smooth round head is safe for furniture and play equipment Unique design is great for connections where the head is not accessible for tightening Made from zinc plated steel for durability Self-locking square neck and coarse threads fasten very securely Fully threaded Includes 1-piece to complete your project Knowing the correct types of fasteners will make your projects run more smoothly and be more secure. This guide will tell you about the types of nuts and bolts and the different types of bolt heads. Purchasing the right grade of bolt will make sure you have a solid, durable joining of two materials. Choosing the right type of washer for a project can be more complicated than it seems. This guide will list and describe the many types of washers and their recommended purposes. Product Name: 1/2 in. x 2-1/2 in. Galvanized Hex Bolt (15-Pack)
Description: About This Product These hex bolts have hexagonal heads and are for general purpose applications with a socket type installation tool or standard wrench. The standard bolt is compatible with standard nuts and washers of the same thread pitch, grade, and finish. Grade-8 bolts have a higher strength and are to be used with Grade-8 nuts. An alternative for using hex bolts without nuts is to place them directly into a compatible female threaded receptacle. They require a pre drilled hole or pre-tapped hole with compatible female thread. Available in various materials, grades, and finishes. Product Name: 1/4 in. x 2 in. Hex Zinc Plated Lag Screw
Description: About This Product Lag Screws are hex head screws with thick shafts and coarse threads. They are designed to securely join wood pieces together in heavy load applications. Commonly used for decks, framing, retaining walls, and wooden playground equipment. Lag Screws can also be used in masonry if combined with a lag shield. Highlights: - Lag screws, also called lag bolts, firmly fasten wood together - Stronger and thicker than typical wood screws - Ideal for woodworking involving heavy pieces joined together Extremely sturdy load-bearing fastener Made from zinc plated steel for durability Lag screws can withstand significant stress over a long period of time 5/32 in. pilot hole is recommended Use with a 7/16 in. drive Includes 1 lag screw to complete your building project Knowing the correct types of fasteners will make your projects run more smoothly and be more secure. Product Name: 5/8 in.-11 x 6 in. Zinc Plated Carriage Bolt
Description:
About This Product
Carriage bolts have a smooth rounded head with a square neck underneath that locks into wood when tightened. Use with a pre-drilled hole and secure with a hex nut and washer to prevent spinning. They are great fasteners for decks, play equipment, docks, fencing, and furniture.
Highlights:
- Extremely sturdy load-bearing fastener
- Square neck prevents the bolt from turning once installed
- Smooth round head is safe for furniture and play equipment
Unique design is great for connections where the head is not accessible for tightening Made from zinc plated steel for durability Self-locking square neck and coarse threads fasten very securely Fully threaded Includes 1-piece to complete your project

Product Name: M12-1.25 x 65 mm Zinc Class 8.8 Metric Hex Bolt
Description:
About This Product
Crown Bolt's metric hex bolts, also known as cap screws, have hexagonal heads and are for general purpose applications with a socket type installation tool or standard wrench. The standard bolt is compatible with standard nuts and washers of the same thread pitch, grade, and finish. Grade 8 bolts have a higher strength and are to be used with Grade 8 nuts. An alternative for using hex bolts without nuts is to place them directly into a compatible female threaded receptacle. They require a pre drilled hole or pre-tapped hole with compatible female thread. Available in various materials, grades, and finishes.
Highlights:

1-piece per bag Steel construction Zinc plated finish M12-1.25 x 65 mm Hex head

Product Name: 1/2 in. x 3-1/2 in. Zinc Carriage Bolt (20-Pack)
Description: About This Product This carriage bolt features a smooth, rounded head with no external drive for appearance, safety and security. The square shank under the head pulls into the material as nuts are tightened and prevents the bolt from turning once completely installed. Common applications for this bolt include deck building, fence construction and outdoor furniture. They are generally pushed into a pre-drilled hole and then tightened in place with hex nuts and flat or lock washers. Available in various materials and finishes. Highlights: - Great for deck building, fence construction, and more - Square shank under head prevents bolt from turning once installed - Zinc-plated steel construction is built to last 20-pieces per pack Steel construction Zinc-plated 1/2-13 in. x 3-1/2 in. Description:
About This Product
Eye bolts feature a closed loop on one end, which makes them useful for securing wiring, rope, cable, chain and etc. The other end features machine screw threads that allow the bolt to be secured using included hex nuts. It is very important to choose the proper eye bolt for your application based on load requirements.

- Used to attached light-duty items
- Steel construction offers long-lasting use and solid performance

Product Name: 1/4 in. x 6 in. Galvanized Hex Bolt (15-Pack)
Description:
About This Product
These hex bolts have hexagonal heads and are for general purpose applications with a socket type installation tool or standard wrench. The standard bolt is compatible with standard nuts and washers of the same thread pitch, grade, and finish. Grade-8 bolts have a higher strength and are to be used with Grade-8 nuts. An alternative for using hex bolts without nuts is to place them directly into a compatible female threaded receptacle. They require a pre drilled hole or pre-tapped hole with compatible female thread. Available in various materials, grades, and finishes.
Highlights:

15-pieces per pack Steel construction Galvanized finish 1/4-20 in. x 6 in. Coarse thread
